how_to_use: This json file defines what characteristics are considered for the desired model. The options for each field are:
user_embeddings: true or false (using only lowercase letters). Depending on the option, the model will consider (or not) the content of the users profile in its prediction.
retweet_embeddings: true or false (using only lowercase letters). Depending on the option, the model will consider (or not) the content of the news retweets in its prediction.
embedder_type: GloVe or BERTweet (both in quotes). This option defines how embeddings will be generated - using GloVe or BERTweet
